title: rAjEndra kanyE
sahitya:
rAjEndra kanyE  (jaya jaya) girisuta gambhIra gajamukha kumAra janani mAmava madagaja mahA


anupallavi

  tEjOmayAnanda dEvi (ati) kapAlini shiva rAjapUjita ranjani pada sarOja dEvi mAmava jaya jaya
						(madhyamakAla)


caraNam    mAlini manjuLa pAlini hamsini mAtangi mAdhavi paripAlani parimaLa vAsana divya hAra shAlini ambE
vyaktakAra mANikya makuTa hEmAbharaNa padma shAnta pItAmbari 
panca dashAkSari sundari shrI ati sOdari shankari mAmava janap-
